entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or light snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
